text: Call for papers - Advancing methods in healthcare research and education"As a medical professional, I am excited to share my passion for research and education in the field of healthcare. With over three dozen publications in various fields, including orthopedics, women's health, pediatrics, infectious diseases, and public health, I have dedicated my career to advancing our understanding of healthcare and improving patient outcomes. As a peer reviewer for multiple medical journals and a research instructor for the Online Research Club, Nagasaki, Japan, I am committed to mentoring the next generation of clinical researchers and promoting excellence in medical education. My areas of interest include patient safety, global surgery, clinical microbiology, and infectious diseases, and I look forward to collaborating with others who share my dedication to improving healthcare through research and education.
